name: BlewMinds
description: Blewmind Pinwheels framework talks about our belief in the philosophy that when organizations & individuals are given a stage of freedom, free space, unfettered Learning environment they almost always bloom & grow. Our Pinwheels indicate free flow, breezy innovation & unwound hearts to create ripples of change.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Believe be Beyond
ShortDescription: BlewMinds is a new age, radical & transformation-thinking eclectic boutique, full services StoryTelling Consulting organization.
enhanced_description: BlewMinds is a new age, radical & transformation-thinking eclectic boutique, full services StoryTelling Consulting organization. Grounded in their 'Pinwheels framework,' they believe in fostering freedom and an unfettered learning environment for organizations and individuals to bloom and grow, creating ripples of change through breezy innovation. They specialize in strategic StoryTelling Consulting, with features such as Diversity Hiring & Inclusion, including a specific focus on enabling LGBTQ+ communities. Their services aim to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency, improve employee happiness and engagement, and build a more diverse and inclusive workforce.
